scripts.backend-go: cd backend && cd node && nodemon index.js
scripts.python-activate: cd backend && cd python && cd security_header && cd flask && source bin/activate
scripts.backend-node: cd backend && cd go && nodemon --exec go run main.go --signal SIGTERM
scripts.backend-python: cd backend && cd python && cd security_header && python3 app.py
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run backend-go" "npm run backend-node" "npm run backend-python" "npm run frontend"
